${exam.name}
试卷副标题

<#list exam.bigQues as bigQues>
评卷人
得分
${bigQues.indexNo}、${bigQues.name}共(${bigQues.questions?size})题,${bigQues.defaultScore}分
<#list bigQues.questions as ques>
${ques.indexNo}. <#list ques.contents as content> <#if content.type == 'IMG'> <#assign image = exam.images[content.data]>
${image.base64}
<#else> ${content.data} </#if> </#list>
<#if ques.options??>
<#list ques.options as option> ${option.optionNo}. <#list option.contents as content> <#if content.type == 'IMG'> <#assign image = exam.images[content.data]>
${image.base64}
<#else> ${content.data} </#if> </#list> </#list>
</#if> <#if ques.childQuestions??> <#list ques.childQuestions as childQues>
${childQues.indexNo}. <#list childQues.contents as content> <#if content.type == 'IMG'> <#assign image = exam.images[content.data]>
${image.base64}
<#else> ${content.data} </#if> </#list>
<#if childQues.options??>
<#list childQues.options as option> ${option.optionNo}. <#list option.contents as content> <#if content.type == 'IMG'> <#assign image = exam.images[content.data]>
${image.base64}
<#else> ${content.data} </#if> </#list> </#list>
</#if> </#list> </#if> </#list>
</#list>

参考答案 <#list exam.bigQues as bigQues>
${bigQues.indexNo}
<#list bigQues.questions as ques>
${ques.indexNo}.
【答案】 <#list ques.answers as content> <#if content.type == 'IMG'> <#assign image = exam.images[content.data]>
${image.base64}
<#else> ${content.data} </#if> </#list>
【解析】 <#list ques.parses as content> <#if content.type == 'IMG'> <#assign image = exam.images[content.data]>
${image.base64}
<#else> ${content.data} </#if> </#list>
</#list> </#list>
